website_summaries.verdict: A number one choice for athletes and athletic and medical trainers
pros: Glue adhesive won't rub off on skin and leave a sticky residue
Perfect for weightlifters, boxers, and other athletes that need wrist support and full flexibility
Tears easily with fingers without the need for scissors
cons: Customers commented that it's not great when ripped into smaller strips for fingers

customer_reviews.title: Best for sweat
customer_reviews.text: Thicker, stronger tape with better adhesive than Mueller's current offering and the less expensive Solimo. Still easy to remove if you've been sweating, but adheres through the activity, at least for tennis and pickleball. Best we've found recently. Needed something for taping a foot for plantar fasciitis issue, and for a sore wrist. Costs more, $3.33 per 10 ft. roll, but it works. Other tapes came loose with sweat. Update. Just received our third order of this tape, after trying yet another brand. This is still the best.
customer_reviews.author: Joyeuse

customer_reviews.title: Not Great For Climbing
customer_reviews.text: Giving this an ok rating because it was not great climbing tape, to wrap fingers. It might work for taping ankles or for hands in combat sports but the adhesive was not sweat resistant enough to stay on for long climbing sessions. After an hour or so, I could pull the entire wrap off my fingers. Contrast this to Metolius tape that was so stuck on that after climbing for 4 hour sessions I dreaded having to peel it off my fingers. It was half the cost but it really does not suit that purpose.
customer_reviews.author: D. Chism

customer_reviews.title: Great Tape! Buy it!
customer_reviews.text: Great tape! I will be buying more for sure. I used it for snatches and it was fantastic. Held on way better than expected. Coming off was just a tad painful since it sticks so well. Much rather that problem than the tape not sticking, which I’ve encountered. Highly recommend if your using for wrapping your wrists.
customer_reviews.author: Travis

customer_reviews.title: JIUJITSU IS LIFE ! 🦍
customer_reviews.text: This is the best tape I have ever used for jiujitsu. I usually just buy the tape from Walmart but one day I had stumbled on some tape laying around on the floor and started using it. I found out quickly that I loved this tape looked on the inside and BOOM!! HAMPTON in big black letters. I didn’t know how large the roll was until I actually bought it but this tape tears perfect, it stays on for my gym session and jiujitsu session and it’s really easy to take off. I paid 11$ for 3 rolls and it’s definitely worth it. I’m gonna stick with this brand. Thanks!!
customer_reviews.author: Adrian Alonzo

customer_reviews.title: GREAT TAPE !
customer_reviews.text: Originally I bought this tape for wrapping my son’s lacrosse stick (works great for that, too!) But, after I ordered it & before it arrives, I developed double tennis elbow. Up from elbow to shoulder & elbow to wrist. Terribly painful. I iced & then wrapped (Ace bandage) it, but the wrap I had didn’t stick well & it was not tight enough to support. Instead of going to the drug store, I decided to wrap this tape over top of the wrap & voila ! Much better support & it stuck ! I love how flexible it is & strong. It’s also very versatile. I’ll be buying more of this stuff ... great value for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy J. Rees

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy if you need hypoallergenic products
customer_reviews.text: The tape works great, but I wish they would clearly state that this is not a hypoallergenic product. I've attached a picture of my wrist, this was my reaction after using this tape for a day.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Baseball Catcher Approved!
customer_reviews.text: I play hardball baseball and these are a must. I wrap my wrists and sometimes a forearm or ankle. These work great in the mud and dirt of catching. They do not stretch out and hold pressure no matter how must dirt or sweat is on them. They are very sticky so removing them can be difficult. I do use pre-wrap most of the time, but not all of the time. They will rip hair and leave some redness on your skin. But they work very well and do not rip apart or give. I'll be purchasing them again.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas B.Top Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Too sticky for my plantar fasciitis but otherwise great tape
customer_reviews.text: I used the tape for my plantar fasciitis!! It is very good tape and stays on my foot when running! It is sticky but it comes off easily.The only problem I had was the tape was too tight on my foot which aggravated it. I gave it to my friend who has plantar fasciitis also and she loves the tape!!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Renae

customer_reviews.title: Sticks well, comes off easily
customer_reviews.text: This is a great combination tape that all at once manages to stick to the skin really well, but come off really easily. I use it for fashion tape during shoots for outfits that don't allow for bras or that need to stay put in a certain place.
customer_reviews.author: DVD

customer_reviews.title: Not Ideal For Skin Use
customer_reviews.text: I bought this in hopes of taping up my knee but found that the tape itself wasn’t very adherent to my skin. Within minutes the tape had lifted up at the edges and lost its stickiness. I tried to round out the corners and apply pressure for several seconds to encourage a better stick but the tape kept coming off. In addition to this, I could not tear the tape with my fingers and had to use a scissors despite the tape being advertised as easy to tear. While this tape may be ideal for sports equipment, I would recommend it be used on skin.
customer_reviews.author: Kaylee

customer_reviews.title: Great tape!!!!
customer_reviews.text: If you are looking for something that will hold up to sweat and movement this is your tape. I use it on my foot for Judo and it holds during my training... better then what I have bought in the store
customer_reviews.author: Anthony G

customer_reviews.title: Tears easily where yoh want it without stringy mess
customer_reviews.text: Great tape, it actually tears! I train Brazilian jiu jitsu and sometimes need to tape joints. There's a never ending struggle to find tape that will tear. Who has scissor 5 minutes before class? No one. My poor dog has a bot fly wound on her arm and I've been using it to keep the wound packed with antibiotics and keep her from chewing at it. So it's sticky and working great for that too.
customer_reviews.author: Honda_Chick

customer_reviews.title: false advertisement
customer_reviews.text: Sticky enough to stay in place and provide enough support. Good value for the money. It's my first time using this kind of tape, and it hurt soooo bad when I took it off. But then I realise you can wet the tape for an easy removal. So that's no problem. The reason I say there's false advertisement is because 1, the tape is NOT hand-tearable; and 2, there is still tiny amount of residue when you take the tape off, but that's easy to remove.
customer_reviews.author: AllisonZ

customer_reviews.title: Great for wrapping, easy to tear and remove, does not leave residue.
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as the title said. I used them for wrapping my knuckles and they do the job very well. Stays put, comes off easily and does not leave any residue. I also use these on the back of pictures to stick to a board, they do a great job of sticking to different surfaces, and again comes off easily without damaging the pictures.
customer_reviews.author: sssnail

customer_reviews.title: That's a wrap!
customer_reviews.text: Little bit wider than what I was expecting but it's not huge. Very grippy tape that I use twice a week for my ankle support and to hold on my moleskin. Three big roles of tape, great quality. Will buy more when I use this stuff up. Also as for removability I'm not sure, I use trauma shears that I bought from Amazon to take it off.
customer_reviews.author: Brettski

customer_reviews.title: Not sure this was the right tape.
customer_reviews.text: Actually didn’t want to write this text. It could be a superior product but not for the use I need it for. I have lymphedema and need to wrap my legs with bandages at night. This is too big and doesn’t adhere well but maybe it’s not for the use I intended or it is the wrong tape ordered. I don’t think anyone should go by my review. I’m only doing this because the company does keep asking me. And it’s nice they care.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen

customer_reviews.title: Top quality, great value!
customer_reviews.text: This was used as a recovery from a sprained ankle. It is a superb product. It’s very strong, yet doesn’t feel too rigid. It tears easily but still really durable. It was on a woman’s ankle so I can’t comment on how it may rip hair out, but it came off with ease on hair free skin with no skin tearing. There is absolutely no comparison between this and the low quality stock product I was using from DSG when in a bind. Definitely worth the purchase!
customer_reviews.author: David Morris

customer_reviews.title: Great tape
customer_reviews.text: Great tape. I've used a lot of brands of athletic tape. The biggest problems with them is that either they don't stick very well or the one's that do stick, leave sticky adhesive all over your skin. This tape sticks on really well and removing it is easy. Just soak the tape under running water and it peals right off and doesn't leave any residue.
customer_reviews.author: toby

customer_reviews.title: Great sports adhesion tape!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for the purpose of taping my MMA gloves, and they worked perfectly fine. My teammates do use them for their injury prevention cases. They are reasonably priced and have great length for the amount that you pay for. I highly recommend them for the injury prevention as well as taping up gloves to prevent scratches.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Using for mask.
customer_reviews.text: For some reason, I have sensitivity behind the ears when I wear a mask too long. I also wear glasses. This tape fixes both those issues. Just started using it, but it works great so far.
customer_reviews.author: Hawki007

customer_reviews.title: Easily the best of 5 brands I have tried
customer_reviews.text: Used for taping my ankle to protect a peroneal tendon injury. I also tried Ace, Mueller, Wal-Mart brand, and Dropskip. This was by far the best. Easiest to apply due to ease in tearing, yet it holds up well. Comes off roll better than others. Held up well walking 18 holes. This is the only brand i will now buy.
customer_reviews.author: Keith

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: The first time I ordered this tape it didn't stay on but the quality (firmness and thickness) was better than any other tape I bought so I reordered figuring I'd just wear socks over it. Well, last 2 times I ordered, it's stayed on really well. I recommend it if you're looking for firm tape. The kinesiology tape doesn't work for me. It's too flexible. This tape works great!
customer_reviews.author: LEXXIE

customer_reviews.title: I'll buy it again.
customer_reviews.text: I tape my daughter's ankles before every bball practices and games. I've used other ones from Walmart and Target, those were hard to tear and wrap. I am happy to say I am very pleased with this tape. It has good adhesive but just make sure you don't stick it on prewrap right away because adjustments would be impossible. My daughter say it's not hard and feel good to her ankles. The amount of tape per roll, make price worthy. One roll I can wrap my daughter's ankles at least 2 times each ankle. Where as store wraps, I can only get in 1 wrap per ankle.
customer_reviews.author: Thong

customer_reviews.title: Great tape for lifting support
customer_reviews.text: I bought this tape to support my wrists when lifting heavy and it does just that. I shaved the hair on my wrists though because it was super adhesive and would literally wax all my hairs off and it hurt lol. After shaving the hair off, the tape didn’t hurt to rip off as much. I also like how easy it was to rip the tape, no need for scissors because it rips easily when you’re trying to rip it, otherwise it’s very stable and doesn’t come off when in use. Honestly, as a athlete I’ve used lots of tapes and this one has been the best, even better the Mueller brand my college used
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super Sports Tape
customer_reviews.text: This tape is very supportive and adheres well. I had to skip using it on my shoulder blade for several days because it broke the skin when removed. I left it on several days and probably should have removed it every day! I use it in conjunction with a shoulder brace. My shoulder is improving daily.
customer_reviews.author: Betsy

customer_reviews.title: great for wrist support
customer_reviews.text: i work at a boxing gym and have had problems with my wrists sincethe time i was playing rugby in highschool, which was about 4 years ago. i use these for when im holding pads for people and it really helps reduce the pain and strain on my wrists. my only complaint, stopping these from being perfect and therefore 5 stars, is they lose their adhesiveness once they get some sweat on them, other than that theyre great. theyre tough, they tear well and they keep my wrists from moving too much.
customer_reviews.author: MARZ

customer_reviews.title: Great athletic tape
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this product. My daughter has had some prolonged pain after an ankle sprain and we have used this tape regularly prior to athletic practice. It is sturdy, easy to apply and tear off, doesn't fray, and feels snug. Far higher quality than tape we purchased at a major sporting goods chain earlier.
customer_reviews.author: Food Fan

customer_reviews.title: BEST TAPE TO STICK TO A DOGS FUR/HAIR WITHOUT PULLING IT OUT
customer_reviews.text: GREAT CUSTOMER SERVICE! Shipped immediately. This is absolutely the best quality tape to use on a dog to adhere gauze or bandages to a dogs hair or fur. I have tried absolutely every type of tape and this one is absolutely the BEST! I LOVE IT! Wide enough for a big dog (mine is a 100 lb Boxer).
customer_reviews.author: PETMOODS

customer_reviews.title: Incredible
customer_reviews.text: Have been using J&J tape as well as Mueller tape for many, many years and decided to try this brand WOW what a great surprise great adhesion, easy to tear and a great price, give it a try you will not be disappointed at all!!! highly recommended I have already repurchased to stock up !!
customer_reviews.author: T. Egan

customer_reviews.title: Good tape for a stiff wrap
customer_reviews.text: Good tape for wrapping ankles and things like that. Held up very well but not a tape you could wear for multiple days. Much easier to use than cheaper tapes with the easy tear edges and it also applied easier as it did not stick to itself as easy as some tapes when wrapping. No issues with adhesion once it was on.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Bell

customer_reviews.title: Terrific Tape
customer_reviews.text: I used this directly on my skin and with gauze (sometimes) in order to keep a consistent position on my foot during activities. It really helped to reduce the pain and speed up recovery. It was easy to use and remove. It is nice to be able to just rip the amount off and get a clean tear. Also, none of the adhesive came off on my skin which was fabulous!
customer_reviews.author: JudyO

customer_reviews.title: Works exactly as advertised
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this tape on my wrist for the last few games and it does what it's supposed to do. It sticks to the under-wrap properly and comes off easily enough when i'm done. As a GK, the taped area does see a lot of sweat, so the fact that it's still holding as it should after the game gives it my seal of approval.
customer_reviews.author: Mozleron

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice tape. My high school football player son uses it to tape his fingers and my 10 year old competative gymnast daughter tapes het wrists and ankles. Very flexible, not stiff. I believe I've reordered it twice already. Will continue.
customer_reviews.author: Duenwen Hsiao

customer_reviews.title: tears easily and no residue : )
customer_reviews.text: I use this tape for part of the sole of my feet and also toe to prevent blistering and it works really well. Even being on the foot (lots of moisture) and playing tennis or table tennis for 2-3 hrs it stayed on. I like that there is no residue.
customer_reviews.author: jlaidley

customer_reviews.title: adhesive separates from fabric
customer_reviews.text: Tape thickness is good, but as soon as you start to sweat the adhesive delaminates from the fabric and the tape starts to loosen and come off. I'm using this for crack climbing and ligament support and its just not doing it. The easy to remove aspect is slightly true, but not really.
customer_reviews.author: Mike M

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good until summer
customer_reviews.text: Pro: price, delivery, callus protection. Con: stretches and moves with heat (see photo). Tape is too wide to fit small fingers good. It worked decent until AZ summer started, then not so good. Doubt i will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I like because its adhesive is strong. I dislike because it isn't thick enough so I need to double wrapped my plantar fasciitis foot to keep it steady. Overall, that's good.
customer_reviews.author: Mei Hime

customer_reviews.title: adhesive worked!
customer_reviews.text: I bought a three pack of adhesive so I could continue taping the bottom of my foot. Plantar fasciitis is really annoying and a long haul to heal. but taping really helps. Thanks for the good product.
customer_reviews.author: Debra Wallace

customer_reviews.title: Peels Off Sweaty Fingers Easily
customer_reviews.text: I use athletic tape to support my finger tendons while rock climbing. I usually buy tape from the gym, but they're all closed. I thought athletic tape was simple, but my tape slipped right off my fingers during a climb. Tape also smells like cheap arts and crafts glue, which I never noticed in my other athletic tape. Good deal overall though, ten bucks for three rolls. Maybe the tape holds up in colder weather, I'll find out as i'd imagine ill have these rolls of tape for the next year at least. But i wont be buying more of this brand in the future
customer_reviews.author: Thomas

customer_reviews.title: White Atheletic Sports Tape
customer_reviews.text: Still getting used to this tape; it's to protect my fingers while gardening & weeding 3 acres. Haven't been able to tear it without starting it with a scissor cut first, but then it does tear. It's nice in that it does not leave residue on your fingers & it comes off easily enough.
customer_reviews.author: Diana

customer_reviews.title: Hard to clean residue
customer_reviews.text: There is no sticky substance left as in the shopping introduction. After using it for punching, there are some sticky substances on my wrists and gloves, which is difficult to clean up. I am rather disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Andy. Gentileschi

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Exactly what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: Perfect - exactly the kind of tape I was looking for - a little bit of the "clothy" feel and has a little bit of texture to it, not the shiny silky kind of medical tape. But also not really thick and bulky. you can rip it with your hands, not SUPER easy - but also not really hard either. I also like that this is somewhat wide and not a really narrow roll of tape.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas M.

customer_reviews.title: Great deal on high quality sports tape.
customer_reviews.text: Got this to keep in gym bag for my daughter who always has some ache or sprain. Just used this weekend to tape her wrist for soccer. Goes on easy and provided good support. Stayed on for a pretty physical game in which she had a lot of diving saves -- kept the sprained wrist firm and prevented further injury. Great tape great value.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald R Richardson

customer_reviews.title: It's great but you have to buy other products for a proper experience.
customer_reviews.text: This is by far more elastic and sticky than the stuff you can get at the store so I really enjoy it. The only real issue is that you'll need to buy something to put under it because, again, it's sticky. Even shaving my wrists doesn't protect against the pain of ripping it off. Other than that it's basically perfect.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: The slip off my finger as soon as I start to sweat during a workout  workout
customer_reviews.text: I use it for Crossfit and once it start to get sweaty they slide right of my fingers . The are the worst I’ve used so far. The are easy to cut, so maybe for other uses beside sport they might be useful.
customer_reviews.author: Shaul shay Nissim

customer_reviews.title: It's a tape I expected, and it's what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I expected. It taped up my lacrosse sticks, taped up my ankle, and and all the other white tape needs I had. I'll be buying this again once I run out of three rolls that I bought.
customer_reviews.author: EarlyMorningRiser

customer_reviews.title: Use the tape the Pros use.
customer_reviews.text: This tape is Exactly as Advertised. I am using it to wrap around an old and slick, but favorite putter grip that is no longer available to buy. This tape is Really comfortable and also provides a secure, no-slip feel. If I still played tennis I would wrap a layer around that grip also. Happy sporting!!
customer_reviews.author: gMaC

customer_reviews.title: Kinda Gooey
customer_reviews.text: I haven't used a lot of athletic tape in my adult life, but I have been recently doing some leg compression for which it would be helpful. This is much 'gooier' than the tape my PT uses. I still think it's good purchase, though.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. M

customer_reviews.title: I've only had it a few weeks so not sure how it holds up in the long run but so far so good. I'll buy it again whenever I need more
customer_reviews.text: This athletic tape is a solid product. I purchased it to increase the grip for rings, pull-up bars and similar equipment. I do calisthenics predominantly and this is on my rings and local pull-up bars. Very minimal if any residue is left on your hands during/after use. After several days of heavy rain, I returned to the bars and the tape was in the same condition, seemingly unaltered by the elements. I've only had it a few weeks so not sure how it holds up in the long run but so far so good. I'll buy it again whenever I need more.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Happy Customer
customer_reviews.text: This tape is exactly what I was looking for....its strong, easy to tear and not as sticky as others I have tried....have weakness in my foot/arch due to an injury and this tape helps support my foot where I can walk longer distances without the pain I would get not using it.
customer_reviews.author: PLk

customer_reviews.title: Sticks well...comes off easily without hurting.
customer_reviews.text: I actually bought this to make my 7-year -old grandson a pretend leg cast. It wrapped around his leg wonderfully and stayed on most of the day...even while he was hobbling around pretending he was h hurt.
customer_reviews.author: DIANNE  (Maryland)

customer_reviews.title: Great tape!
customer_reviews.text: I use this to wrap my wrist to support it while riding motorcycles (old racing injury). A wrist brace won’t work with gloves. Works great and is easier to take off than put on. Highly recommended and you get a bunch of it!
customer_reviews.author: Alan Ottley

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product
customer_reviews.text: Best athletic tape I’ve ever used. I wrap one of my feet anytime I hike or take a long walk. The tape tears very easily but is strong when applied. It is easy to remove and the adhesive material does not stick UNLESS you shower with it still on and then the “glue” comes off on your skin and is difficult to remove. Tape removal is not a problem as long as you don’t get it wet. Overall, I love this tape. Low price is another plus. I highly recommend this tape.
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: Stability
customer_reviews.text: I have tried other brands and I like this one because the tape sticks well and stays put, even when I sweat. I use it to tape my hands finger or any other part that I need support for exercising.
customer_reviews.author: Ylenarose

customer_reviews.title: good for taping hands, fingers
customer_reviews.text: i use this for volleyball as i am a setter where i tape my thumb joints and other fingers (when needed). effective and good product as it has edges that allow you to tear the bandage without the need for a scissor.
customer_reviews.author: buddy

customer_reviews.title: Would purchase again
customer_reviews.text: My daughter needed it for kinesiology class. Arrived quickly. Packaged well. Affordable. She said it worked well in class, she now knows how to properly wrap a foot. Would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: kaybee

customer_reviews.title: I'm happy with the Athletic tape
customer_reviews.text: I have two boys, 6 and 4, who love looking up to the pros and mimicking them. From baseball to boxing. They want to tape their wrists up for baseball and their hands up for boxing. So far we've only used it for fun but it's good tape. I'm glad we have it laying around now in case one of them actually needs it. Sticks good but not so sticky that it pulls skin off. My 4 year old can handle it. I will buy this again when we run out.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Great adhesion
customer_reviews.text: I have a sore on my foot that needs stabilization so it doesn't tear open again. Unfortunately my feet sweat like crazy. This tape has worked perfectly so far. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Randy Farr

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Tape
customer_reviews.text: I have been searching for the perfect tape, and with Hamptons athletic tape I've found it. It fits my needs perfectly, I have played lacrosse for 15yrs and nothing has held up like this tape. I can't wrap my sticks and not worry about slippage. Thank you for this product.I'm such a huge fan of this tape. The stickiness is incredible and its super easy to rip because of the ridges on the edges. Its just overall such good quality. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: shannon stuart

customer_reviews.title: Great help for plantar fasciitis
customer_reviews.text: Easy to handle, does not cause rash or allergic reaction, sticks well but easy to remove and leaves no residue. I found website showing exactly how to tape foot to relieve pain of plantar fasciitis. Taping was suggested by friend whose foot doctor had highly recommended this treatment. My doctor never even mentioned taping!
customer_reviews.author: Lady of the North

customer_reviews.title: Okay
customer_reviews.text: Used this to keep Dr. Scholl's Wart Remover discs and pads in place on foot. Stuck well, but caused a rash on foot. Not sure if it was a reaction to the adhesive or if it was so sticky that it pulled off small bits of skin and that's what the rash was. So 3 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Boston Mom

customer_reviews.title: Takes a ripping, and keeps on sticking
customer_reviews.text: This is the ONLY tape our gymnast wants in her bag! Strong, easy to use, and a great price!
customer_reviews.author: Terry Andrews

customer_reviews.title: Supportive without the mess
customer_reviews.text: This tape doesn't leave any residue on my skin after removing it. I mainly use it for taping my wrists for boxing. I use the tape first and then use my wraps over it. This creates a much more stable cast around my wrists to prevent injuries. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: The Only Sports Tape
customer_reviews.text: As a soccer player the ability to keep your shin guard center on your leg becomes a nuisance throughout a game. Hampton Adams sports tape quickly resolved this issue, stays on during the toughest of games, rain or shine, slide tackles and no need for scissors!
customer_reviews.author: Alfredo Cabrera

customer_reviews.title: Sports Tape
customer_reviews.text: . My daughter plays basketball hurt her ankle. After her ankle healed. Coach recommended for her to use while she played basketball. She and I love the tape because it doesn’t stick to her skin and it easily removes. The price was just right. I recommend to anyone to try it for themselves.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again
customer_reviews.text: I put this tape to the test on my foot & it held very well! I'm on my feet most of the day, so it had to be really good quality, without sticky residue.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca S.

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: This is a Good product and the only way I found to make sure I don't get blisters when lifting weights. The only down side I found (been using it for over 6 mounts) is that it not easy to tear.
customer_reviews.author: LoveBooks

customer_reviews.title: Good stabilizer for joints
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is in Color Guard at her school, she holds a 6’ flag pole she is a petite 5’2 girl and does a series of moves and tosses holding the flag, she complained about instability in her wrists every time she did such moves. I got her this tape, not only she is doing better, she feels more comfortable wielding the flag.
customer_reviews.author: jorge

customer_reviews.title: so sticky it peels skin off
customer_reviews.text: way too sticky litterally rips out hairs and peels skin off !! while on works fantastic its the taking it off part that sucks ...wont be ordering again
customer_reviews.author: Lilith

customer_reviews.title: Strong, sticky, and versatile tape that is easy to tear!
customer_reviews.text: This tape is amazing. I don’t have a lot of strength in my fingers but can EASILY tear the tape without the need of fumbling around for scissors. I had another coach show me an ankle wrapping technique and as I thanked him for his time he asked about the tape I was using. He loved the feel, the ease of use, its strength in holding the tape job but being light and flexible. It was my first of many recommendations for this product!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Athletic Tape
customer_reviews.text: This Athletic tape is AMAZING!! I use it for taping my ankle for football. It sticks very well to the pre-wrap and gives me a ton of support! I can always trust this product and I would definitely recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Karen W.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to tear and use.
customer_reviews.text: I use the tape for my feet as added support against plantar fasciitis. Easy to tear and has pretty good adhesion but use Cramer's to insure the tape really sticks to my feet. Ridges on the side of the tape makes it really easy to tear as well. Don't hold up on my feet in wet muddy conditions which is expected but otherwise it works great.
customer_reviews.author: Barrett Powers

customer_reviews.title: Very good, very sticky
customer_reviews.text: I've bought this tape a few times before and have used it each time for taping sprained ankles and swollen hands. It's super sticky and great for that purpose. I cannot rate how "Easy to remove" the tape is because I've never really thought about that, as I just want the tape to stick on really well. It's a good value too for the 3-pack compared to what you get in a brick-and-mortar. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: James Boyle

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Athletic Tape!!
customer_reviews.text: As a former High School coach, taking care of my athletes was always a priority. Now retired, I work with my grandkids and work to maintain their health and prevent injuries. One way is through taping. The tape from Hampton-Adams has been excellent, has good adhesion even with sweat. Just great working athletic tape. Great price too! Check them out! Well worth it!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This tape is awesome!
customer_reviews.text: It's literally everything in the name. I use it on my wrists when I do my upper body workout. It's strong, it does in fact tear easily, and it doesn't leave any residue. When I sweat it does move a little, but that will happen with any tape. It'll stay where I want it for the full hour of my workout. The edges haven't frayed in my backpack either. It's a great value for what you get. Cheaper than Walmart.
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: Substandard Adhesion
customer_reviews.text: Very little stickiness! The tact seems substantial as it is pulled from the roll, but hardly adheres to the skin. Disappointing performance.
customer_reviews.author: grateful1

customer_reviews.title: Great Tape!
customer_reviews.text: Not the best for my application (protecting pinky from friction) but, is an excellent product. Strong adhesion, no residue, doesn’t hurt when removing from skin, can be easily torn with hands + decent quantity of product
customer_reviews.author: Zahra

customer_reviews.title: Best thing ever
customer_reviews.text: I use the wrist tape for baseball, I play shortstop. In high school a lot of balls are hit very hard at you, and without the tape I was making a lot of errors because my glove keep on popping off or my wrist would bend back. Ever since I put it on, I’ve had 18 balls hit to me with no errors. This tape is the best thing ever. I do suggest that you shave the area where you would add the tape because the tape sticks to your hair. But that’s it
customer_reviews.author: Gramola bar

customer_reviews.title: Worked well, low tack c
customer_reviews.text: Works well for the additional support needed due to a pulled leg muscle. This product has low tack however, if you have long(ish) hair on your legs...expect there to be some unpleasant pull when you remove it.
customer_reviews.author: Kaylr31

customer_reviews.title: Does not adhere well
customer_reviews.text: This isn’t very sticky. I bought this hoping to help my hands not get so torn while lifting. I’m not very impressed with how well it adheres to the skin.
customer_reviews.author: Bridget Howard

customer_reviews.title: Leaves SOME residue, rolls up with socks
customer_reviews.text: I use this product to tape up my arches/ankles when I play basketball, and they do feel pretty good, but tend to roll up in my sock when I play, and stick to the socks when I pull them off. That leaves sticky residue on my foot AND in my sock. pretty annoying. It does work however for its purpose while I am playing so just a note for others!
customer_reviews.author: YEETcity

customer_reviews.title: Woks great for me
customer_reviews.text: I'm a post collegiate shot Putter so I am taping my wrist and fingers every time I practice or compete, and this tape works great for me. I tape pretty tight and this tape holds up very well over a long practice. The only thing I have encountered with my last roll is that the last little bit of tape is hard to get off the roll but it has only happened once and i have been using this tape well over a year and a half.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Graves

customer_reviews.title: Good tape. I use it to tape my fingers ...
customer_reviews.text: Good tape. I use it to tape my fingers to play Vollyball. If you make your hand wet to wash your face, the glue does not stick to you hand, but some other tape I tried they do. However, I could not find any tape which does not start to open when they get wet.
customer_reviews.author: Ardi

customer_reviews.title: Great tape!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent tape for a sore foot and blistered toes. Just the right width-the tape I bought at the local grocery was too narrow. Inexpensive price, but high quality.
customer_reviews.author: Shell

customer_reviews.title: Great item
customer_reviews.text: My daughter started gymnastics and this is perfect for her, she’s 8 and rips easily and she does it all herself no issues.
customer_reviews.author: JRAE

customer_reviews.title: Very Sticky tape
customer_reviews.text: V Good tape for price but was extremely sticky so have to Handle carefully or can re-stick to itself . I was not using on skin so cant comment on its removability there
customer_reviews.author: Dr LAR

customer_reviews.title: The best sports tape we’ve used
customer_reviews.text: My daughter uses this tape to wrap her wrist for tumbling on her cheer team. It’s got great support and the adhesive is strong enough to hold for her 3hr practices and yet easy enough to get off without ripping any body hair off. She loves this tape and we will continue to buy it 😊
customer_reviews.author: Martha

customer_reviews.title: This Athlete Tape does the job.
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is a professional tennis player. She is graduating from High School in May and the this Athletic Tape has been essential for the hours apon hours of practice she puts on the courts weekly. We will start alot more traveling soon and having this tape in her tennis bag to help her wrist and hold her together will be paramount simply said...This tape works great.
customer_reviews.author: Stephan Brewington

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: I use this tape to wrap my girls feet before soccer. It works! Stays on for the entire practice and through tournament days. We also use to tape shin guards in place when the socks won't hold them. There is a lot more tape on the roll than what I was getting from the drug store. I have no complaints. In fact, I've ordered the product twice now.
customer_reviews.author: Pulaski Mom

customer_reviews.title: Good for injured ankle
customer_reviews.text: Great for taping my injured ankle. I looked up a few videos for taping technique. Easy to rip and easy to remove.
customer_reviews.author: JosCee

customer_reviews.title: Great Tape for ATC
customer_reviews.text: I used this to practice my taping & it stuck pretty well to the pre-wrap. Without the proper scissors it is hard to remove but over all great tape!
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Quiroz

customer_reviews.title: pretty good tape
customer_reviews.text: pretty good tape. I used it to wrap wrists in brazilian jiu jitsu, but because you sweat so much, the tape starts to lose it's adhesion. not bad though.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick D

customer_reviews.title: Best tape ever
customer_reviews.text: One of the best sports tapes I have used ! Easy to apply and stickers very well and will not come loose while working out and sweating.
customer_reviews.author: Jesus Ramos

customer_reviews.title: works great
customer_reviews.text: only issue when going around something, if the tape touches it self it wont come apart ... not a bad thing like all tapes do this its just something to beware of so your dont have to restart over and over if you have a moving pet , person etc
customer_reviews.author: Tim R

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I use on my foot and it stays put and doesn't move. Gives me the compression I need for Morton's Neuroma
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Good but stickt
customer_reviews.text: Good for the most part but if you have it on for long when you take it off your skin gets super sticky
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These look sturdy
customer_reviews.text: just having this tape around makes me want to tape up for my next MMA fight or to label my usb sticks.
customer_reviews.author: Seth Hamilton

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty, durable tape with great sticking ability.
customer_reviews.text: This reminds me of the tape they use in football to wrap ankles with. Very durable and great sticking power. Good value also.
customer_reviews.author: MFormby

customer_reviews.title: Just as described. Love it.
customer_reviews.text: This tape is strong. Works as it says. If you need to keep a bandage dressing in place, this will work great.
customer_reviews.author: Glenda M. Baby-G

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't still well
customer_reviews.text: The tape looks good ,but it doesn't still well at all. Taped my foot and just mins later I could feel it turning loose in my sock
customer_reviews.author: William

product_meta.title: (3 Pack) White Athletic Sports Tape VERY Strong EASY Tear NO Sticky Residue BEST TAPE for Athlete & Medical Trainers. PERFECT on bat, Lacrosse / Hockey stick, Lifters, Climbers & Boxing
product_meta.description:
Brand Name: Hampton Adams

 

Color: White

Size: 3.8cmx10cm (1.5" or 1 1/2" x 15 yards)

Hampton Adams athletic tape protects joints from injury and sprains, and provides support to help speed recovery after injury. Also used on equipment, such as baseball bats, hockey sticks, bar bells and more.

Features:

 1. Cotton substrate
 2. Soft and comfortable
 3. Good tensile strength
 4. Non elastic, provide maximum compression, apply properly to avoid cutting circulation
 5. Easy tear by hand lengthwise and widthwise
 6. Strong and reliable stickiness
 7. Constant unwinding tension
 8. Leaves no residue on body parts
 9. Economical

Applications:

Supporting bandages for strains and sprains

Fixing bandages for hot, cold packs

Compression bandage to help control swelling and stop bleeding

Sports equipment binding

HAMPTON Sports Athletic tape provides additional athletic support and helps prevent injuries to knees, ankles, wrists, elbows and fingers. Tears easily by hand along length and width; No scissors required.

Conforms easily to the skin. Perfect for physical therapy rehabilitation: No skin irritation. Non-elastic, rigid tape adheres strongly, but unwinds easily and consistently all the way to the core.

Strong support bandaging and provide firm support to ankles, wrists, hands and different body parts. Will not transfer even under the most adverse conditions.

Money back Guarantee:

We are so confident in our tape that we leave offer a money 60-Day back guarantee. We are sure that you will love it and if you don't we'll give you a refund.
feature_bullets: NO GLUE ON YOUR SKIN - Our 3 Pack of tape was made with a special formula to make sure it reels with ease. Works perfectly for weight Lifters, rock Climbers and boxing or sparring.

TEAR WITH YOUR FINGERS - Our tape is VERY strong but there is no need for tape cutters. Just wrap, pinch, tear and enjoy your workout. You'll be presently surprised when you notice the difference quality can make when it comes to rigid athletic tape.
INSANELY STICKY - Tired of tape that doesn’t hold? Our premium adhesive tape sticks like it should. Perfect on PERFECT on bats, Lacrosse sticks, hockey sticks.

MEDICAL GRADE MATERIAL - 100% cotton. Perfect for Physical Therapy & Therapists. For baseball bats, lacrosse sticks, pull up and pole vault bars. Tough enough to last through an entire Crossfit workout. Stop settling and get HAMPTON.
60-DAY MONEY BACK GUARANTEE - We Believe in our product 100% so you have nothing to lose GET YOURS.
